channel.title: Copying Objects

item.title: Copying Objects
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Okay so I wanted to code castle wars into my server, but I’m using the Guthix, Saradomin, and Zamorak enter Portals for something already I tried some what “copying” them bye using null objects and putting this in class46 if(i == 13981) { //null object Id class46.aString739 = "Enter"; Option class46.aByteArray777 = "It's a Red Portal.".getBytes(); //Examine class46.anIntArray773 = new int[1]; class46.anIntArray773[0] = 2318; //Model found of the Zamorak portal in a object dump }
So yeah I was trying to make a copy of them so I could replace the original with copy’s so I could use the originals for Castle wars (or vice versa) well either way it didn’t really work out I got rid of the null and ended up with this:

0001-2.png782×538

Plus it’s not animated or it is but is doesn’t move like the portals usually do… any help is appreciated thanks.
EDIT: This is what was in the Object Dump for the Zamorak Portal:

if(i == 4388){ objectDef.name = "Zamorak Portal"; objectDef.objectModels[0] = ""2318"; objectDef.actions = new String[5]; objectDef.actions[0] = "Enter"; null"; null"; null"; "null"; objectDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = ""11218"; objectDef.description = "A portal to join the Zamorak team.".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
